elements.text:
You go to your parents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your father looks a lot less healthy than you remember. Neither one of your parents mentions anything about his health. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I want to make the most of my time with my father.
I think about how miserable I will be when he passes away, but then remind myself to enjoy my time with him today.
My parents must be keeping a secret about his health, but then tell myself that everyone ages.
